titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Roger Keeran Photographs PHOTOS.187

publicationstmt.publisher: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-08-03 11:57:14 -0400.

repository.corpname: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives

did.abstract: The Roger Keeran Photographs document a meeting and a picnic held by District Council 65 of the United Automobile Workers (UAW). The dates and locations of both events are unknown.

bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Scholar Roger Keeran publicly identifies as a member of the Communist Party, and as of 2013, Keeran is the Labor and Policy Studies Coordinator at Empire State College in New York. Keeran has published widely on subjects related to labor, communism, and the Left.
District Council 65 began its affiliation with the UAW in 1979. In 1994, District Council 65 dissolved as a result of bankruptcy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Roger Keeran Photographs; PHOTOS 187; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Archives has no information about copyright ownership for this collection and is not authorized to grant permission to publish or reproduce materials from it. Materials in this collection, which were created in 1983, are expected to enter the public domain in 2104.

processinfo.head: Processing Information Note
processinfo.p: The Roger Keeran Photographs were rehoused in a shared box in March 2013.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The provenance of this collection is unknown. The accession numbers associated with this collection are 1950.039 and NPA.2001.002.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Materials have been arranged by an archivist within 3 folders.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: The Roger Keeran Photographs document a meeting and a picnic held by District Council 65 of the United Automobile Workers of America (UAW).
